title: I did it... I saved the town..

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Distract a player at night, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Distracting an evil role will stop them from being evil and make them leave the town.
- This role was made in memoriam of the Escort and Consort roles being changed to dumber names.
